meaningMnemonic: Who goes into their <radical>yurt</radical> to <radical>boil</radical> things? The <kanji>common</kanji> people! <kanji>All sorts</kanji> of people do it, it's really common. You don't boil things outside, do you?
readingMnemonic: Here, the <kanji>common</kanji> people all do this, so just let me <reading>show</reading> (しょ) you how. First you go into your yurt, and… Hey, pay attention and watch what I'm showing you!
